name: Harley-Davidson Europe
goal: Harley-Davidson Europe Ltd. is the regional head office for sales, marketing, distribution and other associated activities of the Harley-Davidson Motor Company, within Europe, the Middle East and Africa (EMEA).  With the regional head office based in the UK, the company has a further 12 subsidiary offices located across the EMEA territory, selling products into 52 countries within the region. Sales of heavyweight motorcycles, parts, accessories and general merchandising are made “business-to-business”, to an independent dealer network.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Environment, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Type-Approval Regulation 168/2013
Urban Mobility Package
Periodic Technical Inspection (Roadworthiness) Package
Clean Power for Transport Directive
Driving License Directive
Intelligent Transport Systems
Free trade agreements/Market Access
White Paper on Transport
Road Safety Initiatives
Personal Protective Equipment Regulation
